CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select cmn_cal_evt_presentations.CMN_CAL_EVT_PresentationID, cmn_cal_evt_presentations.PresentationLocation, cmn_cal_evt_presentations.MaximumNumberOfParticipants, cmn_cal_evt_presentations.PresentationTitle_DictID, cmn_cal_evt_presentations.PresentationDescription_DictID, cmn_cal_evt_presenters.PresenterDisplayName, cmn_cal_events.StartTime From cmn_cal_evt_presentations Inner Join cmn_cal_events On cmn_cal_evt_presentations.Ext_CMN_CAL_Calendar_RefID = cmn_cal_events.CMN_CAL_EventID And cmn_cal_events.IsDeleted = 0 And cmn_cal_events.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID Inner Join cmn_cal_evt_presenters On cmn_cal_evt_presenters.Presentation_RefID = cmn_cal_evt_presentations.CMN_CAL_EVT_PresentationID Where cmn_cal_events.StartTime >= CurDate() And cmn_cal_evt_presentations.IsDeleted = 0 And cmn_cal_evt_presentations.Tenant_RefID = @TenantID And cmn_cal_evt_presentations.IsFeaturedEvent = 1 And cmn_cal_evt_presenters.IsDeleted = 0 And cmn_cal_events.IsDeleted = 0 Order By cmn_cal_events.StartTime
